artist: Calligrapher: Hon'ami Kōetsu; Artist: Underpainting by Tawaraya Sōtatsu
catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 175
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: calligraphy-inscribed shikishi with underpainting in gold of a full moon
inscription: {Momijiba no nagarete tomaru / minato niwa / kurenai fukaki / namiya tatsu rane.} (In the harbor where the waters converge, the waves are deep red as the floating autumn leaves swirl and eddy.)
medium: Ink and gold on gold-decorated paper
object_name: Album leaf, mounted as hanging scroll
portfolio: From Collection of Japanese Poems of Ancient and Modern Times (Kokin wakashū 古今和歌集)
title: Poem from the Collection of Japanese Poems of Ancient and Modern Times (Kokin wakashū)
